xml.p: Mon: "I don't know you. Why are you talking to me?" #!String
Resort_Entering: "Buh... hope the bar's open." #!String
Resort_Leaving: "Welp... got my year's supply of Vitamin D. Now I can play video games with the blinds shut the rest of the year." #!String
Resort_Shore: "That's right... I'm not wearing any shoes or socks.#$b#Some call it a public health risk.#$b#The crabs seem to enjoy it, though.$h" #!String
Resort_Chair: "Hoo... Feels good to rest these hams.#$b#If anyone needs me, I'll just be sitting here, marinating." #!String
Resort_Bar: "Phew... feels good to have a cold drink...#$e#Or maybe a few..." #!String
Resort: "Okay, this sand is piping hot. I regret not wearing shoes.$s" #!String
danceRejection: "...No.$s" #!String
pamHouseUpgrade: "I heard you built Pam a house... That's really generous...#$b#You know, I could use a hundred thousand gold myself...#$e#*ahem* ...ah ...Just kidding. ...Heh." #!String
pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: "I heard someone bought Pam a house... *sigh*... What did Pam ever do to earn that kind of generosity??" #!String
divorced: "...$a#$e#...Leave me alone.$a" #!String
breakUp: "*gulp* Oh... Yeah, okay... I guess I should've seen this coming.$s#$b#I'll... uh... guess I'll see you at the Saloon." #!String
dumped_Guys: "%Shane has a glazed look in his eye. He won't speak to you." #!String
secondChance_Guys: "I don't understand you... *sigh*..." #!String
Mon2: "I hardly know you. Why are you talking to me?" #!String
Mon4: "Hey. Sorry if I came off as rude when we first met.#$e#It takes me a while to warm up to strangers." #!String
Mon10: "Do you ever feel like the whole world is scrutinizing you like some disgusting insect?" #!String
Tue: "What? What do you want? Go away." #!String
Tue2: "What do you want from me? Money? I'd give you a pot of gold to leave me alone!" #!String
Tue4: "Every time I try something new it goes horribly wrong. You learn to just stay in a shell." #!String
Tue6: "Life isn't so bad... at least I have frozen pizza and eggs.$u" #!String
Wed: "No, I don't have time to chat with you." #!String
Wed8: "I guess I've grown attached to Marnie and Jas. We're a ragtag bunch but it kind of feels like a weird family.#$e#I never really had much of a family as a kid.$s" #!String

Wed4: "$d Joja#*sigh* ...Every day is the same. Stocking those horrible shelves, going to the saloon, tossing and turning all night.$s|I hated my job at JojaMart, but now that I'm unemployed I feel even worse.$s" #!String
Thu: "What do you want? Leave me alone." #!String
Thu4: "You're really persistent. I guess I'm just surprised that anyone would be interested in talking to me." #!String
Thu6: "Buh... Where's the Joja Cola?" #!String
Thu8: "You like talking to me? I guess I believe you... maybe you're as weird as I am.$h" #!String
Fri: "Don't you have work to do?" #!String
JojaMart: "%Shane's hard at work. He doesn't seem interested in talking." #!String
Fri4: "$d Joja#What's the point of life if all you do is work?|I haven't been able to pay my rent, but Marnie's letting me stay anyway. I'm lucky." #!String
Fri6: "I'll definitely be going to the saloon tonight. What else is there to do?" #!String
Sat: "Why are you bothering me? I want to be alone." #!String
Sat2: "#$1 ShaneJOSH#I'm surprised that you're still trying to make friends with me. Haven't I been rude enough to you yet?#$e#*sigh*...$s" #!String

Sat4: "$d Joja#I'm renting my room from Marnie at a really good price. It's small but I can't complain.|If I could reset my life maybe I'd start a chicken farm. Only free-range eggs of course." #!String
Sat8: "I've really grown attached to Marnie's chickens.$h" #!String
Sun: "I'm busy, can't you tell?" #!String
Sun6: "...I think I might be gaining weight.$s" #!String
Sun8: "If I watch more TV maybe I can forget about life. That would be relaxing.$u" #!String
Sun10: "Hi, @. I've actually been having a pretty good day so far.$h" #!String
Sun4: "Hmm... it's %time. Should I throw a frozen pizza in the microwave, or should I wait?$u" #!String
Sun2: "You again? How many times do I have to tell you to leave me alone?$s" #!String
event_room1: "Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask Elliott for advice next time I see him at the saloon.$s" #!String
event_room2: "Sounds great. I'll have to create a bunch of practical effects to make it look cool." #!String
event_noLoan1: "I didn't know you were such a miser...$s" #!String
event_noLoan2: "Okay, Dad...$s^Okay, Mom...$s" #!String
event_noLoan3: "Oh, wow...$s" #!String
event_apologize1: "...Yeah, me too." #!String
event_apologize2: "I know... that's why I stopped by, to tell you about it." #!String
event_apologize3: "Wow, it was that serious, huh? I can hardly remember..." #!String
event_stadium1: "Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.$6#$b#Me? I get bored with Pelican Town sometimes.#$b#But... I like that you're different. We balance each other out.$l" #!String

event_stadium2: "Oh really? I'm surprised... Didn't you move to Stardew Valley to escape the noise of the city?$6#$b#I mean... Don't get me wrong, I totally understand. My life in Pelican Town is pretty bland, you know." #!String
